input.sentences: we went over the weekend to checkout the whales at the harbor .
we started off the day driving over an hour to the harbor .
once we got to the harbor we were greeted by a whale flipping in the water .
later in the day we saw multiple whales in close proximity .
at the end of the day we checked out the museum which had more information on the whales .
output.sentences: They decided to spend a weekend at the harbor and watch the whales.
In the early afternoon, they started the 2 hour long harbor boat ride.
They were excited to see the first whale in the water soon after they begun their harbor boat ride.
Astonishingly, multiples whales could be seen swimming in close proximity to eachother.
Later, they were sure to visit the museum to learn all the information they could about whales.
